definition: urgently/eagerly/worried/(urge sb to) be sure to/it is absolutely essential to (follow the above instruction)
definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]
definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]

sentences.english: Convective clouds had come to an end only when the road is sadly Maek Maek Red Dust storms.
sentences.chinese: 曲終人散流雲過，只當是紅塵風雨切切路陌陌。

sentences.english: At the end of the day you have the final say on how you experience reality.
sentences.chinese: 這樣在你臨終的時候你才能說你切切實實地經歷過。

sentences.english: Keep your heart with all vigilance, For from it are the issues of life.
sentences.chinese: 你要切切保守你心，因爲生命的果效發之於心。

sentences.english: They whispered to one another about the taffeta lining and about little mouse tippets.
sentences.chinese: 切切私語着塔夫綢的襯裏還有關於老鼠的小披肩。

sentences.english: As the deer pantech for the water, So my soul longeth after thee.
sentences.chinese: 如同鹿切切渴慕溪水，我靈依渴追求你。

sentences.english: Chattering and pattering, pattering and chattering, As pearls, large and small, on a jade plate fall.
sentences.chinese: 嘈嘈切切錯雜彈，大珠小珠落玉盤。

sentences.english: I will recover , i will hear it whisper back.
sentences.chinese: 我會轉醒，我會再聽到那切切私語。

sentences.english: I have nothing but hatred for them; I count them my enemies.
sentences.chinese: 我切切地恨惡他們，以他們爲仇敵。

sentences.english: Snuggle up close to him, and whisper sweet-nothings.
sentences.chinese: 依偎在他身上，開始甜甜的切切私語。

sentences.english: And he straitly charged them, and commanded them to tell no man that thing;
sentences.chinese: 耶穌切切的囑咐他們，不可將這事告訴人。

sentences.english: He'd pose with it, whiskers twitching , wile the women cooed their admiration.
sentences.chinese: 這情景惹得在場的女人們切切私語，羨慕不已。

sentences.english: It really and truly may never happen.
sentences.chinese: 它可能是真真切切的從未發生過。

definition: to warn/to urge/to exhort/to give instructions carefully and insistently
variant of 辜負|辜负[gu1 fu4]
can be compared to/is the same as
precious/extremely valuable/(honorific) Please take good care of yourself!
to look forward eagerly to sth/keenly desired
